node.statement: Step 1.3.1 (q-Witten index computation): The q-Witten index is W_q(r) = Tr_{Fock}[(-1)^F exp(2pi i r N_psi/3)] where the trace is over the full Fock space of N=[2j+1]_q-dimensional fermions. Since the fermion operators are undeformed (only the couplings carry q-dependence), this trace factorizes identically to the undeformed case: W_q(r) = omega^{-N/2} (1 - omega^r)^N where omega = exp(2pi i/3) and N = 2j+1. The Witten index is q-INDEPENDENT.
